oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Model 1840 U.S. dragoon sword
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This sword likely belonged to Col. Alfred Harris Abernathy, 53rd Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA. Harris joined the Confederate Army on Dec. 6, 1861, after his brother John died of wounds sustained at the Battle of Cheat Mt., W. Va. Col. Harris surrendered at Ft. Donelson in February 1862, was imprisoned at Ft. Warren, Mass., released July 31, 1862, and exchanged at Vicksburg, Miss. Family papers state that he returned to the war, though his service record does not indicate so.
